name: deepwiki
title: DeepWiki - Intelligent Documentation Generator
description: Comprehensive documentation generation system for codebases. DeepWiki analyzes your codebase structure and generates evidence-backed, well-organized markdown documentation with ASCII diagrams and automatic cross-references.
author: Pandora Team

agents.name: deepwiki-planner
agents.description: Expert codebase analyzer and documentation structure generator. Analyzes code structure and generates a comprehensive documentation sitemap with folder hierarchy, page plans, and navigation rules.

agents.name: deepwiki-doc-generator
agents.description: Documentation content generator for single pages. Generates high-quality, evidence-backed markdown documentation with embedded ASCII diagrams.

commands.name: deepwiki
commands.description: Generate comprehensive documentation for your codebase using DeepWiki system with evidence-backed content, ASCII diagrams, and automatic cross-references.

skills.name: deepwiki-ascii-diagrams
skills.description: ASCII diagram generation skill for creating professional architectural diagrams in text format. Supports C4 models, sequence diagrams, component diagrams, deployment diagrams, and more.
